column4: hey.. anyone know how to adjust hotplug to fix a USB setting?

everything else detects the drive attached to the USB/IDE bridge

it's a USB/IDE box with a Lite-On DVD+-RW drive
fedora/gentoo detect it as a LITE-ON, but ubuntu's hotplug config thinks it's a USB/IDE bridge
sure ubuntu hasnt mounted the device already
no.. it's a CD Burner, with no disks in it
